              def handle_charge_refunded(charge)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                # Find the invoice associated with this charge
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                payment_intent_id = charge['payment_intent']
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                return unless payment_intent_id.present?
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                begin
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  payment_intent = Stripe::PaymentIntent.retrieve(payment_intent_id)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  invoice = find_invoice_by_payment_intent(payment_intent_id)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  return unless invoice.present?
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  # Update invoice status to cancelled
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  invoice.update(payment_status: 'cancelled')
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  # Send refund notification email
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  refund_amount = charge['amount_refunded'] / 100.0
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  # Log activity
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  Activity.create!(
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    vendor_id: invoice.vendor_id,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    subject: invoice,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    action: 'payment_refunded',
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    description: "Invoice ##{invoice.id} refunded: AED #{refund_amount}",
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    metadata: {
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      invoice_id: invoice.id,
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      refund_amount: refund_amount,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      stripe_charge_id: charge['id'],
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                      original_amount: invoice.amount
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    }
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  )
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Invoice ##{invoice.id} refunded: AED #{refund_amount}")
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                rescue Stripe::StripeError => e
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Error processing refund: #{e.message}")
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              def handle_payment_intent_canceled(payment_intent)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                # Check if this is an invoice payment
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                invoice = find_invoice_by_payment_intent(payment_intent['id'])
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                return unless invoice.present?
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                # Log activity
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                Activity.create!(
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  vendor_id: invoice.vendor_id,
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  subject: invoice,
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  action: 'payment_cancelled',
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  description: "Payment cancelled for Invoice ##{invoice.id}",
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  metadata: {
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    invoice_id: invoice.id,
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                    stripe_payment_intent_id: payment_intent['id'],
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    cancellation_reason: payment_intent['cancellation_reason']
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  }
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                )
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Payment cancelled for Invoice ##{invoice.id}")
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237.

              def find_invoice_by_payment_intent(payment_intent_id)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                Invoice.find_by(stripe_payment_intent_id: payment_intent_id) if payment_intent_id.present?
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

              end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

            end
          
      243.

              def car_main_image(car, size: [400, 400], use_variant: true)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                return safe_car_placeholder if car.nil?
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                if car.images.attached? && car.images.any?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  image = car.images.first
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  if use_variant && defined?(MiniMagick)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    image_tag image.variant(resize_to_limit: size), class: "car-image w-full h-full object-cover"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  else
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    image_tag url_for(image), class: "car-image w-full h-full object-cover"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                else
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  safe_car_placeholder
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end

              def car_image_slider(car, height: 'h-96', show_counter: true, show_navigation: true, show_pagination: true)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                return safe_car_placeholder if car.nil?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                if car.images.attached? && car.images.any?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  content_tag :div, class: "relative #{height} bg-gray-100" do
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    # Slider Container
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    slider_content = content_tag :div, class: "swiper-container h-full" do
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      # Slides
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      slides = content_tag :div, class: "swiper-wrapper" do
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                        car.images.map do |image|
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                          content_tag :div, class: "swiper-slide flex items-center justify-center" do
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                            image_tag url_for(image), class: "w-full h-full object-cover", alt: "#{car.brand} #{car.model}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                          end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        end.join.html_safe
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      # Navigation Buttons
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      navigation = ""

    36. 
            

            

                      if show_navigation
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        navigation = content_tag(:div, "", class: "swiper-button-prev swiper-button-white") +
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                                   content_tag(:div, "", class: "swiper-button-next swiper-button-white")
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      # Pagination
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      pagination = ""

    43. 
            

            

                      if show_pagination
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        pagination = content_tag(:div, "", class: "swiper-pagination swiper-pagination-white")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      slides + navigation + pagination
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    # Image Counter
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    counter = ""
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    if show_counter && car.images.count > 1
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      counter = content_tag :div, class: "absolute top-4 right-4 bg-black bg-opacity-50 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-medium" do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        content_tag(:span, "1", class: "current-slide") +
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        content_tag(:span, " / ") +
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        content_tag(:span, car.images.count.to_s, class: "total-slides")
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    slider_content + counter
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  content_tag :div, class: "#{height} bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-100 to-gray-200 flex items-center justify-center" do
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    content_tag :div, class: "text-center" do
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      content_tag(:i, "", class: "fas fa-car text-gray-400 text-6xl mb-4") +
          
      66.

                      content_tag(:p, "No Images Available", class: "text-gray-500 text-lg")
          
      67.

      68.

              def car_images_for_slider(car)

              def admin_whatsapp_link(message = nil)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                return nil unless whatsapp_e164
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                base_url = "https://wa.me/#{whatsapp_e164.delete('+')}"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                message ? "#{base_url}?text=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(message)}" : base_url
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end

              def safe_car_placeholder
          
      94.

      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  content_tag :i, "", class: "fas fa-car text-gray-400 text-3xl"
          
      96.

                end

              def send_invite_email
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                begin
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            

                  self.update(invite_sent: true, invite_token: SecureRandom.hex(10))
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Sending invite email to #{self.email} with token #{self.invite_token}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            

                  VendorMailer.invite_email(self).deliver_now
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              1
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Invite email sent successfully to #{self.email}"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to send invite email to #{self.email}: #{e.message}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  raise e
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end

    16. 
            

            

              end

      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
              145
            

            

                daily_price = car.daily_price.to_f
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              145
            

            

                case selected_period
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                when 'weekly'
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
              139
            

            

                  weekly_price = selected_price.to_f
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
              139
            

            

                  full_weeks = duration_days / 7
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              139
            

            

                  remaining_days = duration_days % 7
          
      32.

              139
            

            

                  (full_weeks * weekly_price) + (remaining_days * daily_price)
          
      33.

      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                when 'monthly'

                case event_data['type']
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                when 'checkout.session.completed'
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

      22.

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

      24.

              def self.create_from_checkout_session(session)

              def refundable?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                status == 'completed' && transaction_type == 'payment' && refund_amount.nil?

              def refund!(amount: nil, reason: nil)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                return false unless refundable?
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                refund_amount_to_process = amount || self.amount
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                begin
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  refund = Stripe::Refund.create(
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    payment_intent: stripe_payment_intent_id,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    amount: (refund_amount_to_process * 100).to_i,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    reason: 'requested_by_customer'
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  )
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  update!(
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    refund_amount: refund_amount_to_process,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    refund_reason: reason,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    status: 'refunded'
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  )
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  # Create a refund transaction record
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  Transaction.create!(
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    booking: booking,
          
      97.

      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    status: 'completed',
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100.

      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101.

      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102.

      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  )
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  true
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                rescue Stripe::StripeError => e
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107.

      108.

              # Include default devise modules. Others available are:

              def self.from_omniauth(auth, nationality = nil, terms_accepted = false, allow_creation)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
              5
            

            

                user = where(provider: auth.provider, uid: auth.uid).first
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # If user exists, update nationality if provided and not already set
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
              5
            

            

                if user.present?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              2
            

            

                  updates = {}
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              2
            

            

                  if nationality.present? && user.nationality.blank?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              1
            

            

                    updates[:nationality] = nationality
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              2
            

            

                  if terms_accepted.present? && !user.terms_accepted?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    updates[:terms_accepted] = true
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              2
            

            

                  user.update_columns(updates) if updates.any?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
              2
            

            

                  return user
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                # If user doesn't exist and creation is not allowed, return nil
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
              3
            

            

                return unless allow_creation
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # Create new user without validation
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              2
            

            

                user = new do |u|
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
              2
            

            

                  u.provider = auth.provider
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
              2
            

            

                  u.uid = auth.uid
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              2
            

            

                  u.email = auth.info.email
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
              2
            

            

                  u.password = Devise.friendly_token[0, 20]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              2
            

            

                  if auth.info.first_name.present? && auth.info.last_name.present?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              2
            

            

                    u.first_name = auth.info.first_name
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              2
            

            

                    u.last_name = auth.info.last_name
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  else
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    # Fallback: split full name if first_name/last_name not available
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    name_parts = auth.info.name.to_s.split(' ', 2)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    u.first_name = name_parts.first
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    u.last_name = name_parts.last || ''
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  # Set nationality if provided
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              2
            

            

                  u.nationality = nationality if nationality.present?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              2
            

            

                  u.terms_accepted = terms_accepted

              def normalize_whatsapp_number
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
              185
            

            

                return if whatsapp_number.blank?
          
      237.

      238.

                # Parse and normalize to E164 format
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              185
            

            

                parsed = Phonelib.parse(whatsapp_number)

    240. 
            

            

                
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
              185
            

            

                if parsed.valid?

    243.

      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  # Clear memoization
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
              184
            

            

                  @parsed_whatsapp = nil
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                else
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  # Try to clean the number
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              1
            

            

                  cleaned = whatsapp_number.to_s.gsub(/[^\d+]/, '')
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
              1
            

            

                  cleaned = "+#{cleaned}" unless cleaned.start_with?('+')
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
              1
            

            

                  reparsed = Phonelib.parse(cleaned)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              1
            

            

                  if reparsed.valid?
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                    self.whatsapp_number = reparsed.e164
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                    self.whatsapp_country_code = reparsed.country_code
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                    @parsed_whatsapp = nil
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259.

              def whatsapp_number_requirements
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
              185
            

            

                return if whatsapp_number.blank?
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
              185
            

            

                parsed = parsed_whatsapp
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
              185
            

            

                unless parsed.valid?
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
              1
            

            

                  errors.add(:whatsapp_number, :invalid_format)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
              1
            

            

                  return
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                # WhatsApp requires mobile numbers (some countries allow landline)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
              184
            

            

                unless parsed.types.include?(:mobile) || parsed.types.include?(:fixed_or_mobile)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:whatsapp_number, :must_be_mobile)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                end
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                # Additional length check (WhatsApp specific)
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
              184
            

            

                unless whatsapp_number.length.between?(8, 16)
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:whatsapp_number, :invalid_length)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

              end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

            end

    61.67% lines covered

    120 relevant lines. 74 lines covered and 46 lines missed.

            class Vendor < ApplicationRecord

              # Include default devise modules. Others available are:

              # :confirmable, :lockable, :timeoutable, :trackable and :omniauthable
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              devise :database_authenticatable, :registerable,
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                     :recoverable, :rememberable, :validatable
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            

              has_many :cars, dependent: :destroy

              has_many_attached :avatar

              # Normalization happens before validation

              before_validation :normalize_whatsapp_number, if: :whatsapp_number_changed?
          
      18.

      19.

              1
            

            

              validates :email, :company_name, :first_name, :last_name, presence: true
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :email, format: { with: URI::MailTo::EMAIL_REGEXP }, if: :email?
          
      21.

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :company_logo, format: { with: URI::regexp(%w[http https]) }, allow_blank: true
          
      23.

              # Emirates ID validations
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :emirates_id, format: { with: /\A\d{15}\z/ }, allow_blank: true
          
      25.

              1
            

            

              validate :emirates_id_expiry_in_future

              # Whatsapp number validations

              validates :whatsapp_number,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                        phone: {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                          possible: true,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                          allow_blank: true,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                          types: [:mobile, :fixed_or_mobile],
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                          message: :invalid_phone
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        }
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :whatsapp_number,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                        uniqueness: { case_sensitive: false },
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                        allow_blank: true,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        if: :whatsapp_number_changed?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              1
            

            

              validate :whatsapp_number_requirements, if: :whatsapp_number?
          
      39.

              # Soft delete functionality

              scope :active, -> { where(deleted_at: nil) }

    46. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :deleted, -> { where.not(deleted_at: nil) }
          
      47.

              # Payment mode enum

              enum payment_mode: { CreditCard: 0, AmericanExpress: 1 }, _default: :CreditCard
          
      50.

              def soft_delete!

                update!(deleted_at: Time.current)

              # Devise method to check if account is active for authentication

              def active_for_authentication?

              # Custom message for inactive accounts

              def inactive_message

                is_active? ? super : :account_deactivated

              scope :with_expired_emirates_id, -> {

              def name

              def full_name

              def self.from_omniauth(auth)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                vendor = where(provider: auth.provider, uid: auth.uid).first_or_initialize do |v|
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  v.email = auth.info.email
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  v.password = Devise.friendly_token[0, 20]
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  # Extract first and last name
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  if auth.info.first_name.present? && auth.info.last_name.present?
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    v.first_name = auth.info.first_name
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    v.last_name = auth.info.last_name
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  else
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    # Fallback: split full name if first_name/last_name not available
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    name_parts = auth.info.name.to_s.split(' ', 2)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    v.first_name = name_parts.first
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    v.last_name = name_parts.last || ''
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  # Set the flag to skip non-essential validations
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  v.from_omniauth = true
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                vendor.define_singleton_method(:skip_omniauth_validations?) { true }
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                vendor.save(validate: false)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                vendor
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
              1
            

            

              def display_name
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                company_name.present? ? company_name : name
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
              1
            

            

              def emirates_id_valid?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                emirates_id.present? && emirates_id.match?(/\A\d{15}\z/)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              1
            

            

              def emirates_id_expired?
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                emirates_id_expires_on.present? && emirates_id_expires_on < Date.current
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              # Memoized parsed phone object for performance
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
              1
            

            

              def parsed_whatsapp
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
              270
            

            

                return nil if whatsapp_number.blank?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
              270
            

            

                @parsed_whatsapp ||= Phonelib.parse(whatsapp_number)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              # Get formatted number for display
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              1
            

            

              def whatsapp_display
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                parsed_whatsapp&.international || whatsapp_number
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

              end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              # Get E164 format for API calls (WhatsApp Business API, Twilio, etc.)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
              1
            

            

              def whatsapp_e164
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                parsed_whatsapp&.e164
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              # Get national format
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
              1
            

            

              def whatsapp_national
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                parsed_whatsapp&.national
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              # Get country information
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              1
            

            

              def whatsapp_country
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                parsed_whatsapp&.country
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              # Check if it's a valid mobile number
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
              1
            

            

              def whatsapp_mobile?
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                return false if whatsapp_number.blank?
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                parsed = parsed_whatsapp
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                parsed.valid? && (parsed.type == :mobile || parsed.type == :fixed_or_mobile)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              # WhatsApp link generator
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              1
            

            

              def whatsapp_link(message = nil)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                return nil unless whatsapp_e164
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                base_url = "https://wa.me/#{whatsapp_e164.delete('+')}"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                message ? "#{base_url}?text=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(message)}" : base_url
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              # Calculate total pending amount from all pending invoices
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              1
            

            

              def total_pending_amount
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                invoices.where(payment_status: 'pending')
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        .joins(:invoice_items)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                        .sum('invoice_items.amount')
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              # Calculate total paid amount from all paid invoices
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              1
            

            

              def total_paid_amount
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                invoices.where(payment_status: 'paid')
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                        .joins(:invoice_items)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                        .sum('invoice_items.amount')
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              # Calculate total amount across all invoices
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              1
            

            

              def total_invoice_amount
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                invoices.joins(:invoice_items)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                        .sum('invoice_items.amount')
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            

              def emirates_id_expiry_in_future
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
              270
            

            

                return if emirates_id_expires_on.blank?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                if emirates_id_expires_on <= Date.current
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:emirates_id_expires_on, "must be in the future")
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_vendor_registration
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
              259
            

            

                Activity.log_activity(
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  vendor: self,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  subject: self,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  action: 'vendor_registration',
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  description: "New vendor registered: #{company_name} (#{email})",
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  metadata: { 
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    company_name: company_name,
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    email: email,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    phone: phone
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  }
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                )
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_vendor_profile_update
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                Activity.log_activity(

              def normalize_whatsapp_number
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
              267
            

            

                return if whatsapp_number.blank?
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                # Parse and normalize to E164 format
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
              267
            

            

                parsed = Phonelib.parse(whatsapp_number)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
              267
            

            

                if parsed.valid?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229.

      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
              267
            

            

                  self.whatsapp_country_code = parsed.country_code
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  # Clear memoization
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
              267
            

            

                  @parsed_whatsapp = nil
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                else
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  # Try to clean the number
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  cleaned = whatsapp_number.to_s.gsub(/[^\d+]/, '')
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  cleaned = "+#{cleaned}" unless cleaned.start_with?('+')
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  reparsed = Phonelib.parse(cleaned)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  if reparsed.valid?
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    self.whatsapp_number = reparsed.e164
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    self.whatsapp_country_code = reparsed.country_code
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                    @parsed_whatsapp = nil
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                end

              def whatsapp_number_requirements
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              270
            

            

                return if whatsapp_number.blank?
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                
          
      250.

                parsed = parsed_whatsapp
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              270
            

            

                unless parsed.valid?
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:whatsapp_number, :invalid_format)

      255.

      256.

      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                # WhatsApp requires mobile numbers (some countries allow landline)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
              270
            

            

                unless parsed.types.include?(:mobile) || parsed.types.include?(:fixed_or_mobile)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:whatsapp_number, :must_be_mobile)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                # Additional length check (WhatsApp specific)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
              270
            

            

                unless whatsapp_number.length.between?(8, 16)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:whatsapp_number, :invalid_length)
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

              end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            end

            class DocumentUploadService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Handles document image uploads for both resident and tourist documents
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # Params:
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # - document: the Document record
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # - params: the params hash from the controller
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Returns: [success, message]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def self.upload(document, params)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                case document.doc_name
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                when 'Home country driving license and IDP', 'A Valid UAE driving license', 'Emirates ID front and back'
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  front = params[:front_image] 
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  back = params[:back_image]
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  unless front.present? && back.present?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    return [false, 'Both front and back images are required.']
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  document.images.purge
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  document.images.attach(front)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  document.images.attach(back)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  document.status = 'pending'
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  if document.save!
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    # Log document upload activity
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    Activity.log_activity(
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      user: document.user,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      subject: document,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      action: 'document_uploaded',
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25.

      26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    )

    28.

      29.

                  else
          
      30.

      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                when 'Passport and Visa copy'
          
      33.

      39.

      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  document.status = 'pending'
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  if document.save
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

    44.

      46.

      49.

      50.
